verses.verse: I <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3820>myself,<s%> <S%H1980>"Come<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> I will <S%H5254>test<s%> you with <S%H8057>pleasure.<s%> So <S%H7200>enjoy<s%> <S%H9185><s%> yourself." And <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it <S%H1571>too<s%> was <S%H1892>futility.<s%>
I <S%H559>said<s%> of <S%H7814>laughter,<s%> "It is <S%H1984>madness,<s%>" and of <S%H8057>pleasure,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> does it <S%H6213>accomplish<s%>?"

I <S%H8446>explored<s%> with my <S%H3820>mind<s%> [how] to <S%H4900>stimulate<s%> my <S%H1320>body<s%> with <S%H3196>wine<s%> while my <S%H3820>mind<s%> was <S%H5090>guiding<s%> [me] <S%H2451>wisely,<s%> and how to <S%H270>take<s%> <S%H270>hold<s%> of <S%H5531>folly,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H834><s%> I could <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H335>what<s%> <S%H2088><s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> there is for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> the <S%H4557>few<s%> <S%H3117>years<s%> of their <S%H9132>lives.<s%>
I <S%H1431>enlarged<s%> my <S%H4639>works:<s%> I <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%> for myself, I <S%H5193>planted<s%> <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> for myself;
I <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H1593>gardens<s%> and <S%H6508>parks<s%> for myself, and I <S%H5193>planted<s%> in them <S%H3605>all<s%> kinds of <S%H6529>fruit<s%> <S%H6086>trees;<s%>
I <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H1295>ponds<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> for myself from which to <S%H8248>irrigate<s%> a <S%H9194>forest<s%> of <S%H6779>growing<s%> <S%H6086>trees.<s%>

I <S%H7069>bought<s%> <S%H5650>male<s%> and <S%H8198>female<s%> <S%H8198>slaves,<s%> <S%H5650><s%> and I <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H1121>homeborn<s%> <S%H1004><s%> <S%H1121>slaves.<s%> <S%H1571>Also<s%> I possessed <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and <S%H1241>herds<s%> <S%H7235>larger<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H7945>who<s%> <S%H6440>preceded<s%> me in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%H1571>Also,<s%> I <S%H3664>collected<s%> for myself <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and the <S%H5459>treasure<s%> of <S%H4428>kings<s%> and <S%H4082>provinces.<s%> I <S%H6213>provided<s%> for myself male and female <S%H7891>singers<s%> and the <S%H8588>pleasures<s%> of <S%H1121>men<s%> <S%H120><s%> â€“ <S%H7705>many<s%> <S%H7705>concubines.<s%>

Then I <S%H1431>became<s%> <S%H1431>great<s%> and <S%H3254>increased<s%> <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H7945>who<s%> <S%H6440>preceded<s%> me in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%> My <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> by me.

And <S%H3605>all<s%> that my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7592>desired<s%> I did not <S%H680>refuse<s%> them. I did not <S%H4513>withhold<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> from <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H8057>pleasure,<s%> for my <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H8056>pleased<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H5999>labor<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> was my <S%H2506>reward<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H5999>labor.<s%>

Thus I <S%H6437>considered<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H4639>activities<s%> <S%H7945>which<s%> my <S%H3027>hands<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> and the <S%H5999>labor<s%> <S%H7945>which<s%> I had <S%H6213>exerted,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> was <S%H1892>vanity<s%> and <S%H7469>striving<s%> after <S%H7307>wind<s%> and <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3504>profit<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>

So I <S%H6437>turned<s%> to <S%H7200>consider<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> <S%H1947>madness<s%> and <S%H5531>folly,<s%> for <S%H4100>what<s%> [will] the <S%H120>man<s%> [do] <S%H7945>who<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> [except] <S%H834>what<s%> has <S%H3528>already<s%> been <S%H6213>done<s%>?
And I <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H3504>excels<s%> <S%H5531>folly<s%> as <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H3504>excels<s%> <S%H2822>darkness.<s%>

The <S%H2450>wise<s%> man's <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are in his <S%H7218>head,<s%> but the <S%H3684>fool<s%> <S%H1980>walks<s%> in <S%H2822>darkness.<s%> And <S%H1571>yet<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4745>fate<s%> <S%H7136>befalls<s%> them <S%H3605>both.<s%>

Then I <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3820>myself,<s%> "As is the <S%H4745>fate<s%> of the <S%H3684>fool,<s%> it will <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H7136>befall<s%> me. <S%H4100>Why<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> have I <S%H2449>been<s%> <S%H3148>extremely<s%> <S%H2449>wise<s%>?" So I <S%H1696>said<s%> to <S%H3820>myself,<s%> <S%H2088>"This<s%> <S%H1571>too<s%> is <S%H1892>vanity.<s%>"

For <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5769>lasting<s%> <S%H2146>remembrance<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H2450>man<s%> [as] with the <S%H3684>fool,<s%> <S%H7945>inasmuch<s%> as [in] the <S%H935>coming<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> will be <S%H7911>forgotten.<s%> And <S%H349>how<s%> the <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H2450>man<s%> and the <S%H3684>fool<s%> <S%H5973>alike<s%> <S%H4191>die!<s%>

So I <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H9132>life,<s%> for the <S%H4639>work<s%> <S%H7945>which<s%> had been <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> was <S%H7451>grievous<s%> to me; <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H3605>everything<s%> is <S%H1892>futility<s%> and <S%H7469>striving<s%> after <S%H7307>wind.<s%>

Thus I <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5999>fruit<s%> of my <S%H5999>labor<s%> for <S%H7945>which<s%> I had <S%H6001>labored<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> for I must <S%H5117>leave<s%> it to the <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H7945>who<s%> will <S%H1961>come<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> me.

And <S%H4310>who<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> whether he will be a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H2450>man<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H5530>fool<s%>? Yet he will have <S%H7980>control<s%> <S%H7980>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5999>fruit<s%> of my <S%H5999>labor<s%> for <S%H7945>which<s%> I have <S%H5998>labored<s%> by <S%H2449>acting<s%> <S%H2449>wisely<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun.<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> <S%H1571>too<s%> is <S%H1892>vanity.<s%>

Therefore I <S%H5437>completely<s%> <S%H3820><s%> <S%H2976>despaired<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5999>fruit<s%> of my <S%H5999>labor<s%> for <S%H7945>which<s%> I had <S%H5998>labored<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>

<S%H3588>When<s%> <S%H3426>there<s%> is a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H7945>who<s%> has <S%H5998>labored<s%> with <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> and <S%H3788>skill,<s%> then he <S%H5414>gives<s%> his <S%H2506>legacy<s%> to <S%H120>one<s%> <S%H7945>who<s%> has not <S%H5998>labored<s%> with them. <S%H2088>This<s%> <S%H1571>too<s%> is <S%H1892>vanity<s%> and a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H9567>evil.<s%>

For <S%H4100>what<s%> does a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H1933>get<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5999>labor<s%> and in his <S%H7475>striving<s%> with <S%H7945>which<s%> he <S%H6001>labors<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%>?

<S%H3588>Because<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H3117>days<s%> his <S%H6045>task<s%> is <S%H4341>painful<s%> and <S%H3708>grievous;<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> at <S%H3915>night<s%> his <S%H3820>mind<s%> does not <S%H7901>rest.<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> <S%H1571>too<s%> is <S%H1892>vanity.<s%>

<S%H369>There<s%> is <S%H369>nothing<s%> <S%H2896>better<s%> for a <S%H120>man<s%> [than] to <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> and <S%H7200>tell<s%> <S%H5315>himself<s%> that his <S%H5999>labor<s%> is <S%H9185>good.<s%> <S%H2090>This<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> I have <S%H7200>seen,<s%> that it is from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>
For <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H9126>have<s%> <S%H9126>enjoyment<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> <S%H4480><s%> Him?

For to a <S%H120>person<s%> <S%H7945>who<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> in His <S%H6440>sight<s%> He has <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> and <S%H8057>joy,<s%> while to the <S%H2398>sinner<s%> He has <S%H5414>given<s%> the <S%H6045>task<s%> of <S%H622>gathering<s%> and <S%H3664>collecting<s%> so that he may <S%H5414>give<s%> to <S%H2896>one<s%> <S%H2896>who<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> in God's <S%H6440>sight.<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> <S%H1571>too<s%> is <S%H1892>vanity<s%> and <S%H7469>striving<s%> after <S%H7307>wind.<s%>
